title.rendered: Rikkeisoft won the 2020 Top 10 Vietnam Companies Award for AI/IoT and Outsourcing

content.rendered:
14th of December, 2020 – Rikkeisoft won the 2020 Top 10 Vietnam Companies Award for AI/IoT and Outsourcing.

In previous years known as the Vietnam Top 50+10 Leading Companies Award, the Top 10 Vietnam ICT Companies Award is presented to companies evaluated and recognized as reputable and outstanding in their fields. Every company that wins an award is listed in a catalogue written in Vietnamese, English, and Japanese, which lists the services available from the company as well as other notable information. Rikkeisoft has won the award every year since 2014, but 2020 marks the first time that the award is being presented based on different categories. 

The award is presented by the Vietnamese Software & IT Services Association (Vinasa). Established in 2002, Vinasa is a national association composed of 270 different member companies, who work together to help develop the Vietnamese software industry. Vinasa members account for 65% of all professional programmers in Vietnam and 75% of all domestic software production.

The award for outsourcing, as presented to our own Phan Thi Lan Anh, commemorates our productive work with clients all over the world. While Japan still makes up our largest client load, 2020 saw us being able to focus more on other countries such as Korea, Australia, Singapore, France, and the United States. In the years to come, we hope to see other countries like Germany, Canada, New Zealand, and more added to the list.

The award for AI/IoT, received by Rikkei AI Director Dang Thai Hoa, was presented in celebration of our work in advancing the realm of Vietnamese robotics. Rikkei AI has spent much of 2020 developing many capable products, like eKYC or OCR systems, that have caught the attention of various news agencies around the country. Luna, our child education robot capable of teaching songs and stories, will be one of the first domestically produced Vietnamese robots in the entire country. 

We are very proud to be receiving these awards as it commemorates our hard work and dedication in these respective fields. We look forward to bringing more top quality service to our customers in the years to come.
